column4: Description
The internal bank credit rating/assessment
Credit assessment type (e.g. consumer, small business, corporate)
The structured report outlining basis for the bank's rating
The customer credit position analysis - combines credit assessment with product/service available balance/utilized credit position analysis
Reference to the one of more products and services in use for which transaction activity is to be obtained
The types of product fulfillment reports available - in this case transaction details used for different measures or position analyses
The product/service activity report - transactional activity used for financial analysis
Defines content/transaction types to be included in the report extract
The from-to dates covered by the report for analysis
Defines presentation format
The requested product/service activity report used in the position measurements
The customer cashflow analysis - past, current position and projected cash flows as derived from all active product/service activity reports

Customer Position: CR Customer Position State Instance Record
column4: The consolidated position state that is tracked for the customer - combines analysis from all  measures
Reference to the title owner of the collateral asset
The type of asset (e.g. building, machinery, inventory, financial instrument, art)
Reference to the collateral item (e.g. address, account reference)
Description of significant details and properties of the asset
Reference to the administration record of the asset item
A general status indicator for the asset (can cover multiple properties as needed)
The current and historical valuation of the asset
A record of past and current allocations of the collateral asset
The date of the last valuation (and next planned valuation)
